TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from developers who love our Ethereum transaction monitoring app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: EtherStream has been a game-changer for our dapp. We can easily track new transactions in real-time without relying on centralized services.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The filtering options let me precisely monitor the transactions I care about. EtherStream saves me so much time and effort.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: EtherStream's decentralized architecture ensures privacy and security for our finance dapp's transaction monitoring needs.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the game by monitoring new Ethereum transactions as they occur. Our app provides instant notifications for the latest activity on the blockchain.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Gain deeper insights into Ethereum transactions with our powerful analytics tools. Analyze transaction patterns, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Tailor the app to your specific needs. Set up custom filters to track transactions based on criteria like wallet addresses, token types, or value ranges. Receive alerts for events that matter most to you.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Our app seamlessly integrates with popular Ethereum clients, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience. Access transaction data directly from your preferred client.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Navigate through the app with ease using our intuitive and user-friendly interface. Quickly access the information you need without any unnecessary complexity.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Trust that your transaction data is safe with our robust security measures. We prioritize data privacy and provide a reliable service you can depend on.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Monitoring App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app monitors the Ethereum blockchain in real-time and alerts you to new transactions as they occur. This allows you to stay up-to-date on the latest activity on the network.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We use advanced algorithms to continuously scan and parse the Ethereum blockchain data as new blocks are mined. Any new transactions are instantly identified and can trigger notifications.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What types of transactions are tracked?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Our app can detect and notify you about all types of Ethereum transactions including token transfers, smart contract deployments and executions, and basic ETH transfers between wallets.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I filter transactions by criteria?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, you can set up custom filters to only receive alerts for transactions matching specific criteria you define such as transaction value, token type, sender/receiver addresses and more.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about tracking new Ethereum transactions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: This app allows you to discover and monitor new transactions happening on the Ethereum blockchain in real-time.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We connect directly to Ethereum nodes to stream incoming transactions as they get mined and added to new blocks.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What can I use it for?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can use this app to track payments to your Ethereum wallets or contracts, watch for specific token transfers, monitor DEX trades, and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, the basic transaction monitoring is free. We offer paid plans with more advanced filtering, notifications and data export features.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Just sign up and add your Ethereum addresses or contract details you want to watch. The app will immediately begin streaming any new transactions.
